title: China Lashes Out at U.S. Allies in Bid to Thwart Biden Strategy
content:
1. China Lashes Out at U.S. Allies in Bid to Thwart Biden Strategy  Bloomberg
  2. China's retaliatory sanctions on the EU set the stage for how Beijing will respond to other global powers  CNBC
  3. US and allies announce sanctions against Chinese officials for 'serious human rights abuses' against Uyghurs  CNN
  4. U.S. U.K. and EU Sanction China Over Human Rights Abuse  Bloomberg Politics
  5. China-Europe sanctions fight shatters image of amicable ties  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
